snippet: James Shields (8-3) won his fifth straight decision as the Kansas City Royals completed a three-game road sweep of the Chicago White Sox with a 6-3 win.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Kansas City Royals complete three-game sweep of the Chicago White Sox with 6-3 win; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: James Shields (8-3) won his fifth straight decision as the Kansas City Royals completed a three-game road sweep of the Chicago White Sox with a 6-3 win.
